backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing orders with create, fetch, list, and status‑update functions stored in a Map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend React components and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind‑based global stylesheet defining custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app and root mount container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up all application routes using TanStack Router and wraps pages in the SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Bitcoin: UI card showing BTC payment info with copy‑to‑clipboard actions for order ID, amount, and address.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout with header navigation, footer, and container structure for all routed pages.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Denom: Callout card highlighting the available USDT gift card range ($500–$50,000).
Dropdown selector for choosing predefined USDT gift card denominations.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Quant: Renders a quantity selector with increment, decrement, and validated manual input, enforcing min/max bounds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and updating orders through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, providing Internet Identity and React Query contexts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin page for viewing full order details and updating the order status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin table view listing all orders with status badges and navigation to order detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays gift card catalog allowing denomination and quantity selection and saves cart session before checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow, order creation, and payment instructions using saved cart data and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the marketing homepage with hero section, feature highlights, and navigation to the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/OrderStatusPage.tsx: Displays order status details, payment info, and conditional Bitcoin payment instructions based on order state.
frontend/src/state/cartSession.ts: Manages storing, retrieving, and clearing cart session data in sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state for a crypto storefront site, detailing features, image requirements, and pending feature requests. Tracks versions, requirements, and configuration for building the Binance gift card sales platform.
